programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Dauntonska opatija
programme.desc: Robert i Kora Krauli nemaju muških potomaka, te će po zakonu njihovo veliko imanje pripasti najbližem rođaku umesto njihovoj kćerki Meri. Međutim, oba potencijalna naslednika stradaju na Titaniku... Robert i Kora Kroli, lord i ledi od Grantama, imaju tri ćerke - Meri, Idit i Sibil, ali nemaju muških potomaka, te će po zakonu njihovo veliko imanje pripasti najbližem rođaku umesto njihovoj najstarijoj kćerki Meri. Ledi Meri je pristala da se uda za svog drugog rođaka Patrika, sina tadašnjeg pretpostavljenog DŽejmsa Krolija. Serija počinje dan nakon potapanja Titanika u aprilu 1912, kada Krolijevi saznaju da su i DŽejms i Ptarik poginuli u potapanju. U potrazi za novim naslednikom, nalaze još daljeg muškog rođaka, Metjua Krolija, advokata, pripadnika srednje klase. Uprkos njihovoj poniznosti i ljupkosti, ne dočekuje ih topla dobrodošlica. Meri i njena baba će iskoristiti svaku priliku da ponize Metjua i njegovu majku Izabel i stave im do znanja da nisu isti nivo. Međutim, grof i grofica će se truditi da se prema njima ophode onako kako dolikuje i kako zaslužuju, pa makar to bilo protivno željama njihovih kćerki i majke. Radnja se u početku usredsređuje na odnos između Ledi Meri i Metjua, koji se odupire prihvaćanju aristokratskog načina života, dok se Ledi Meri opire činjenici da joj se novi naslednik dopada.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Belzer, Diane Neal, Dean Winters, Michelle Hurd, Stephanie March, Ice-T

programme.title: Monk
Monk
programme.desc:
Monk: Created by Andy Breckman. With Tony Shalhoub, Jason Gray-Stanford, Ted Levine, Traylor Howard. The series follows Adrian Monk, a brilliant former San Francisco detective, who now consults the police as a private consultant who battles with an obsessive-compulsive disorder." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0312172/","name":"Monk","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M4NjM0N2QtMDlmNi00NzNkLWEyYjItOTczMjk1ZjU2NDdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The series follows Adrian Monk, a brilliant former San Francisco detective, who now consults the police as a private consultant who battles with an obsessive-compulsive disorder.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0312172/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Monk Mania Is Upon Us","reviewBody":"Here's a cable television that, by word of mouth, is really gaining in popularity..... and it's easy to see why. It scores a bullseye by combining interesting crime stories with humor. When you have that combination and it works, you have a winner.

Monk's comedy, despite what the producers say, is really making fun of people who have compulsive-obsessive disorders (OCD)., but not in a mean-spirited manner. Adrian Monk (Tony Schaloub) and his many phobias are what make us laugh. That's what makes this show unique and sets it apart from every other "whodunnit" show, from Sherlock Holmes to Det. Robert Goren on Law And Order: Criminal Intent.

Shalhoub excels in his comedy, in large part, to his body movements, his reactions to situations and to his deadpan deliveries of hilarious lines. He is a master at all of it, and always entertaining.

I did have trouble, unlike most people, with his sidekick, "Sharona," played by Bitty Schram. I'm sorry but I found her extremely annoying with her OMG's every other sentence and her horrible nasal New Jersey accent. I was glad to hear she left the show midway through the following season but, as others have pointed out: the shows have gone downhill since she left. However good Scrham was in her role, (and she was effective) the show getting weaker by the fourth year is due to the writers, not the appearance of "Natalie Teeger."

The two other main characters and good and bad, too. Levine is good as the no-nonsense, gruff and tough police captain. He looks the part and acts it, but Gray-Stanford is ludicrous as his main detective. He's portrayed as someone totally stupid and immature, and no lieutenant would act like him. He's an insult to the viewers' intelligence. Oddly, he was pictured much more realistically the first season of the show but by the second season he was made into a goof-ball.

Story-wise, each episode is entirely different so it never gets stale. Most shows feature surprising twists and clever plots. That's the idea of the show - odd cases that nobody but the extremely observant Monk could figure out. All his phobias wound up costing him his badge, but he's so smart, the police have to call him in to solve the difficult mysteries.

It's beautifully filmed and occasionally you get a travelogue-type glance at the San Francisco scenery. This show is picking up new viewers each week because it's addicting. Once you've seen a show or two, you have to see more....and it rarely disappoints. After watching this, I purchased the first and third seasons. The first season is outstanding, particularly the opening episode. I'm now looking forward to viewing the third season."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71181,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-07-12","keywords":"obsessive compulsive disorder,2000s,21st century,character name as series title,tony shalhoub character","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001724/","name":"Tony Shalhoub"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0337020/","name":"Jason Gray-Stanford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505971/","name":"Ted Levine"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064942/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0205765/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0106563/","name":"Andy Breckman"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Monk","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2308571417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjBmYmIzNjktNjk0ZS00MjNkLWE1MjMtNmVkMGI2M2Q5ZmJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjBmYmIzNjktNjk0ZS00MjNkLWE1MjMtNmVkMGI2M2Q5ZmJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"}}</script><metacontent="

The series follows Adrian Monk, a brilliant former San Francisco detective, who now consults the police as a private consultant who battles with an obsessive-compulsive disorder." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0312172/","name":"Monk","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M4NjM0N2QtMDlmNi00NzNkLWEyYjItOTczMjk1ZjU2NDdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The series follows Adrian Monk, a brilliant former San Francisco detective, who now consults the police as a private consultant who battles with an obsessive-compulsive disorder.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0312172/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1","dateCreated":"2006-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Monk Mania Is Upon Us","reviewBody":"Here's a cable television that, by word of mouth, is really gaining in popularity..... and it's easy to see why. It scores a bullseye by combining interesting crime stories with humor. When you have that combination and it works, you have a winner.

Monk's comedy, despite what the producers say, is really making fun of people who have compulsive-obsessive disorders (OCD)., but not in a mean-spirited manner. Adrian Monk (Tony Schaloub) and his many phobias are what make us laugh. That's what makes this show unique and sets it apart from every other "whodunnit" show, from Sherlock Holmes to Det. Robert Goren on Law And Order: Criminal Intent.

Shalhoub excels in his comedy, in large part, to his body movements, his reactions to situations and to his deadpan deliveries of hilarious lines. He is a master at all of it, and always entertaining.

I did have trouble, unlike most people, with his sidekick, "Sharona," played by Bitty Schram. I'm sorry but I found her extremely annoying with her OMG's every other sentence and her horrible nasal New Jersey accent. I was glad to hear she left the show midway through the following season but, as others have pointed out: the shows have gone downhill since she left. However good Scrham was in her role, (and she was effective) the show getting weaker by the fourth year is due to the writers, not the appearance of "Natalie Teeger."

The two other main characters and good and bad, too. Levine is good as the no-nonsense, gruff and tough police captain. He looks the part and acts it, but Gray-Stanford is ludicrous as his main detective. He's portrayed as someone totally stupid and immature, and no lieutenant would act like him. He's an insult to the viewers' intelligence. Oddly, he was pictured much more realistically the first season of the show but by the second season he was made into a goof-ball.

Story-wise, each episode is entirely different so it never gets stale. Most shows feature surprising twists and clever plots. That's the idea of the show - odd cases that nobody but the extremely observant Monk could figure out. All his phobias wound up costing him his badge, but he's so smart, the police have to call him in to solve the difficult mysteries.

It's beautifully filmed and occasionally you get a travelogue-type glance at the San Francisco scenery. This show is picking up new viewers each week because it's addicting. Once you've seen a show or two, you have to see more....and it rarely disappoints. After watching this, I purchased the first and third seasons. The first season is outstanding, particularly the opening episode. programme.title: Bruklin 99
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Belzer, Diane Neal, Dean Winters, Michelle Hurd, Stephanie March, Ice-T

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adijan Monk je brilijantni privatni detektiv, koji je nakon nervnog sloma posle smrti voljene supruge, otpušten iz policije. Kriminalistička, dramska serija prati slučajeve simpatičnog i sasvim neobičnog detektiva, Adrijana Monka. Monk pati od opsesivno-kompulsivnog poremećaja, od kad je doživeo stres posle smrti supruge. Iako je nakon nervnog sloma otpušten iz policije, njegovo fotografsko pamćenje i fantastična moć opažanja, omogućuju mu da reši slučajeve u kojima je policija nemoćna.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo. Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Dauntonska opatija
programme.desc: Robert i Kora Krauli nemaju muških potomaka, te će po zakonu njihovo veliko imanje pripasti najbližem rođaku umesto njihovoj kćerki Meri. Međutim, oba potencijalna naslednika stradaju na Titaniku... Robert i Kora Kroli, lord i ledi od Grantama, imaju tri ćerke - Meri, Idit i Sibil, ali nemaju muških potomaka, te će po zakonu njihovo veliko imanje pripasti najbližem rođaku umesto njihovoj najstarijoj kćerki Meri. Ledi Meri je pristala da se uda za svog drugog rođaka Patrika, sina tadašnjeg pretpostavljenog DŽejmsa Krolija. Serija počinje dan nakon potapanja Titanika u aprilu 1912, kada Krolijevi saznaju da su i DŽejms i Ptarik poginuli u potapanju. U potrazi za novim naslednikom, nalaze još daljeg muškog rođaka, Metjua Krolija, advokata, pripadnika srednje klase. Uprkos njihovoj poniznosti i ljupkosti, ne dočekuje ih topla dobrodošlica. Meri i njena baba će iskoristiti svaku priliku da ponize Metjua i njegovu majku Izabel i stave im do znanja da nisu isti nivo. Međutim, grof i grofica će se truditi da se prema njima ophode onako kako dolikuje i kako zaslužuju, pa makar to bilo protivno željama njihovih kćerki i majke. Radnja se u početku usredsređuje na odnos između Ledi Meri i Metjua, koji se odupire prihvaćanju aristokratskog načina života, dok se Ledi Meri opire činjenici da joj se novi naslednik dopada.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Belzer, Diane Neal, Dean Winters, Michelle Hurd, Stephanie March, Ice-T

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adijan Monk je brilijantni privatni detektiv, koji je nakon nervnog sloma posle smrti voljene supruge, otpušten iz policije. Kriminalistička, dramska serija prati slučajeve simpatičnog i sasvim neobičnog detektiva, Adrijana Monka. Monk pati od opsesivno-kompulsivnog poremećaja, od kad je doživeo stres posle smrti supruge. Iako je nakon nervnog sloma otpušten iz policije, njegovo fotografsko pamćenje i fantastična moć opažanja, omogućuju mu da reši slučajeve u kojima je policija nemoćna.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo. Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos
Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones, Christina Hendricks, Michael Gladis, Rosemarie DeWitt, Talia Balsam

programme.title: Bruklin 99
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Mad Men
Momci s Madisona
programme.desc:
Mad Men: Created by Matthew Weiner. With Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones. A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alexnapo"},"dateCreated":"2017-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Faboulous","reviewBody":"When I started watching Mad Men, the rhythm of it felt slow.

Pretty quickly did I realize how much more powerful the slow story & plot development rhythm would be, allowing us to discover the characters, mostly in seasons 1 and 2, and then really be in the thick of it in subsequent seasons.

Indeed, this series has pushed character development so far that they are the entire and only reason why this series is interesting. The actual events happening at the advertising agency is a pretext to throw more things at those characters and have them deal with it. In fact, the characters are so interesting that there is practically no violence needed (except a few minor events) over 7 seasons to keep this series going. I find that tremendously respectable to be able to craft a series in this way, not using gun shots and bombs to make it lively.

Finally, I have not lived in the early 60's time period the series is set in, but I can only say that it's all seemed to me very interesting and all these "vintinge" props and costumes, hair style and such made it all the more fascinating to watch.

Absolutely great work.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224093,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""}}</script><metacontent="

Pretty quickly did I realize how much more powerful the slow story & plot development rhythm would be, allowing us to discover the characters, mostly in seasons 1 and 2, and then really be in the thick of it in subsequent seasons.

Indeed, this series has pushed character development so far that they are the entire and only reason why this series is interesting. The actual events happening at the advertising agency is a pretext to throw more things at those characters and have them deal with it. In fact, the characters are so interesting that there is practically no violence needed (except a few minor events) over 7 seasons to keep this series going. I find that tremendously respectable to be able to craft a series in this way, not using gun shots and bombs to make it lively.

Finally, I have not lived in the early 60's time period the series is set in, but I can only say that it's all seemed to me very interesting and all these "vintinge" props and costumes, hair style and such made it all the more fascinating to watch.

Absolutely great work.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224093,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Dauntonska opatija
programme.desc: Robert i Kora Krauli nemaju muških potomaka, te će po zakonu njihovo veliko imanje pripasti najbližem rođaku umesto njihovoj kćerki Meri. Međutim, oba potencijalna naslednika stradaju na Titaniku... Robert i Kora Kroli, lord i ledi od Grantama, imaju tri ćerke - Meri, Idit i Sibil, ali nemaju muških potomaka, te će po zakonu njihovo veliko imanje pripasti najbližem rođaku umesto njihovoj najstarijoj kćerki Meri. Ledi Meri je pristala da se uda za svog drugog rođaka Patrika, sina tadašnjeg pretpostavljenog DŽejmsa Krolija. Serija počinje dan nakon potapanja Titanika u aprilu 1912, kada Krolijevi saznaju da su i DŽejms i Ptarik poginuli u potapanju. U potrazi za novim naslednikom, nalaze još daljeg muškog rođaka, Metjua Krolija, advokata, pripadnika srednje klase. Uprkos njihovoj poniznosti i ljupkosti, ne dočekuje ih topla dobrodošlica. Meri i njena baba će iskoristiti svaku priliku da ponize Metjua i njegovu majku Izabel i stave im do znanja da nisu isti nivo. Međutim, grof i grofica će se truditi da se prema njima ophode onako kako dolikuje i kako zaslužuju, pa makar to bilo protivno željama njihovih kćerki i majke. Radnja se u početku usredsređuje na odnos između Ledi Meri i Metjua, koji se odupire prihvaćanju aristokratskog načina života, dok se Ledi Meri opire činjenici da joj se novi naslednik dopada.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls
Kad stranac pozove
programme.desc:
When a Stranger Calls: Directed by Simon West. With Camilla Belle, Tommy Flanagan, Katie Cassidy, Tessa Thompson. During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455857/","name":"When a Stranger Calls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcyYjRhZTQtOTVlMy00MDU0LWFhNjktM2MyZDRmODgzMmNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455857/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Weak Remake of a Scary Thriller  Prefer the Original 1979 Version","reviewBody":"Jill Johnson (Camilla Belle) is babysitting two children in a fancy isolated house, when a stranger insists calling her in the phone. She decides to telephone to the police, to trace the phone call. When the officer on duty tells her that the call is being made from inside the house, Jill freaks out and tries to leave the place with the children.

The beginning of the 1979 "When a Stranger Calls" is one of the scariest and most realistic thrillers I have ever seen. The story is excellent, and the performances are stunning. In my opinion, the famous 'Scream' ripped-off the introduction of this film. This 2006 remake is watchable, but director Simon West spoiled an excellent story with a typical Saturday night broadcast predicable movie. The secret of the original film was the claustrophobic environment associated to a realistic plot. The option of this director was to use a huge house, with people coming and going (or vanishing), breaking the tension. Camilla Belle has a pretty face but she is very weak in this dramatic role. Further, her character has the most unreasonable attitudes, for example leaving a house protected by a security system to move to the guest house, or calling the hidden children to escape with her. My advice: see Carol Kane in the original version. My vote is five.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
Ispod površine
programme.desc: What Lies Beneath: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Michelle Pfeiffer, Katharine Towne, Miranda Otto, James Remar. The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0161081/","name":"What Lies Beneath","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTY4NjNkMTMtNTEyOC00NDBiLWFkZjMtZDkwYzU3OTFjOTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0161081/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ih007b2077"},"dateCreated":"2001-09-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Suspense is what lies beneath","reviewBody":"This is the most suspenseful thriller I have seen in the past year. As a refreshing change to more formulaic chillers, WLB takes its time to build the suspense. It is allowed to do this by virtue of Harrison Ford, and, especially, Michelle Pfeiffer, who, I feel, deserved an Oscar nomination for her convincing portrayal of a happy, but suddenly lonely, wife. It is just about as Hitchcockian as you can get, and I rate the bath sequence as gripping (pardon the pun) as taking a shower at the Bates Motel. The plot is thin and the action is played out sedately. Yet it seems perfectly timed in setting the mood of the whole piece. I particularly liked the music,and the supporting actress Diana Scarwid, whose lighthearted attitude during the seance scene made it all the more chilling. A perfect example of good film-making with only a slight plot. I am sure this movie will mature with age until it is rightfully regarded as a modern classic. Count the number of times you jump!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122856,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-18","keywords":"hitchcockian,death by drowning,small village,pick up truck,entity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Lies Beneath","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1004667161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmMxMzhiM2MtY2U4YS00NGVjLWI3YTYtYTgwODM2M2JhN2IzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmMxMzhiM2MtY2U4YS00NGVjLWI3YTYtYTgwODM2M2JhN2IzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Dreamworks"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000201/","name":"Michelle Pfeiffer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870007/","name":"Katharine Towne"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0163988/","name":"Clark Gregg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0449576/","name":"Sarah Kernochan"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0161081, Title: What Lies Beneath, --- Description: What Lies Beneath: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Michelle Pfeiffer, Katharine Towne, Miranda Otto, James Remar. The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0161081/","name":"What Lies Beneath","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTY4NjNkMTMtNTEyOC00NDBiLWFkZjMtZDkwYzU3OTFjOTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0161081/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ih007b2077","dateCreated":"2001-09-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Suspense is what lies beneath","reviewBody":"This is the most suspenseful thriller I have seen in the past year. As a refreshing change to more formulaic chillers, WLB takes its time to build the suspense. It is allowed to do this by virtue of Harrison Ford, and, especially, Michelle Pfeiffer, who, I feel, deserved an Oscar nomination for her convincing portrayal of a happy, but suddenly lonely, wife. It is just about as Hitchcockian as you can get, and I rate the bath sequence as gripping (pardon the pun) as taking a shower at the Bates Motel. The plot is thin and the action is played out sedately. Yet it seems perfectly timed in setting the mood of the whole piece. I particularly liked the music,and the supporting actress Diana Scarwid, whose lighthearted attitude during the seance scene made it all the more chilling. A perfect example of good film-making with only a slight plot. I am sure this movie will mature with age until it is rightfully regarded as a modern classic. Count the number of times you jump!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122856,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-18","keywords":"hitchcockian,death by drowning,small village,pick up truck,entity","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Lies Beneath","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1004667161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmMxMzhiM2MtY2U4YS00NGVjLWI3YTYtYTgwODM2M2JhN2IzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmMxMzhiM2MtY2U4YS00NGVjLWI3YTYtYTgwODM2M2JhN2IzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Dreamworks","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000201/","name":"Michelle Pfeiffer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870007/","name":"Katharine Towne"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0163988/","name":"Clark Gregg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0449576/","name":"Sarah Kernochan"],"duration":"PT2H10M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
Zubati
programme.desc:
Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit: Directed by Kenneth Branagh. With Chris Pine, Keira Knightley, Kevin Costner, Kenneth Branagh. Jack Ryan, as a young covert C.I.A. analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1205537/","name":"Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MDkxNzYwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM2MjE5MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Ryan, as a young covert C.I.A. analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1205537/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"3xHCCH"},"dateCreated":"2014-01-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oddly Familiar, Yet Still Very Exciting Thriller","reviewBody":"Jack Ryan was a young Marine who was injured during a mission when his helicopter crashed. Upon completing his therapy for his injury, Ryan was conscripted by Thomas Harper to be an operative of the CIA because of his keen analytic acumen specifically in economics and finance. 

10 years later, while working in Wall Street, Ryan uncovers some suspicious transactions by a Russian firm which may spell economic disaster Stateside. Ryan goes to Moscow supposedly to do some auditing work. But upon his arrival, it was apparent that this mission was not only going to be about punching numbers into a computer.

Because of his previous work in "This is War", I knew Chris Pine could play a very good spy. Though Pine did not really look like he had a PhD degree, and a lot of his financial talk just flew over my head, his action sequences were very gritty and exhilarating. He also has great chemistry Keira Knightley, the actress who plays Ryan's charming fiancé Dr. Cathy Muller. Her suspicions of an affair unexpectedly gets her involved with Ryan's dangerous mission.

It was good to see Kevin Costner back on screen in a substantial role again. He was older of course, but still looking good. His character Harper may feel like any other mentor/supervisor role in other espionage films, but Costner played him very well. Too bad he was not really given any special moment which can be considered really memorable.

The villain of the film Viktor Cherevin though was another matter altogether. Kenneth Branagh creates a strong antagonist with his subtly sinister portrayal of the Russian businessman with terrorism, economic and otherwise, on his mind. He completely transformed into his role very convincingly, with no trace of British-ness.

This particular Jack Ryan did not feel like this was going to be the same man in the other older films where we knew the character Jack Ryan first, like "Hunt for Red October" (played by Alec Baldwin), "Patriot Games" and "Clear and Present Danger" (played by Harrison Ford) or even "Sum of All Fears" (played by Ben Affleck). This film only has the character Jack Ryan, but in a story NOT written by the books' author Tom Clancy at all.

This film had an oddly generic feel like we have seen this story in some form before. Even if this was set several years post-9/11, it had that dated Cold War (a la classic James Bond) feel especially when the action shifted to Moscow. Fortunately though, despite those gripes, "Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit" is still a very exciting action-packed thriller. 

The director is also Kenneth Branagh, whom we usually associate with Shakespearian productions. He follows up his mainstream directorial work on the first "Thor" film with this one, with much skill. The camera work was excellent especially for the gunfights and car chases. That sequence of firm infiltration was very astutely edited with much tension, impossible as that could have been in real life. 

It was Branagh's energetic story-telling and Pine's charismatic portrayal as Ryan that turned the potentially mediocre script around and created a really effective and entertaining spy thriller, successfully rebooting the character for a possible film franchise. 7/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128580,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-01-22","keywords":"jack ryan character,russian,marine,u.s. marine,terrorist plot","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3398346777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2NTM1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNzM0MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2NTM1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNzM0MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1517976/","name":"Chris Pine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000126/","name":"Kevin Costner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000110/","name":"Kenneth Branagh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3092414/","name":"Adam Cozad"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002007/","name":"Tom Clancy"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: It
To
programme.desc:
It: Directed by Andy Muschietti. With Jaeden Martell, Jeremy Ray Taylor, Sophia Lillis, Finn Wolfhard. In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1396484/","name":"It","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVkZmI0YzAtNzdjYi00ZjhhLWE1ODEtMWMzMWMzNDA0NmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYzODM3Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1396484/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Michael_Elliott"},"dateCreated":"2017-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Some Great Stuff But Also Some Flaws","reviewBody":"It (2017) 

*** (out of 4) 

A small town has a strange history with various disasters that strike every twenty-seven years and more times than not it's children that are harmed. One summer a group of friends realize that they are all being stalked by the vision of a sinister clown known as Pennywise. They soon realize that if they don't try to kill it then he will kill them one by one.

Stephen King's IT was originally made for television in 1990 and it was a hugely successful film that scared the crap out of people. The film had all sorts of hype going into it and it actually lived up to it. The film carried on a cult following for years and then news broke that a new adaptation was coming. This film really try to create the same type of hype and it ended up being a massive box office hit. People were eating it up and it's easy to see why. With that said, as much as I loved certain parts of it there's no question that there are some major flaws as well.

The great stuff includes the drama aspect of the story. The real terror comes from the bullying, the girl's sexual abuse by her father, the blame you place on yourself for your brother's death and of course there's the building of friendships that kids do during the summer. All of this is perfectly done and director Andy Muschietti does a wonderful job with the development of the characters. He also does a terrific job at capturing the mood and setting of a small town. The 1988/89 settings were perfectly captured and you can sit there and feel that you're in a real town with real characters.

All of the performances by the kids are simply wonderful with Sophia Lillis and Jeremy Ray Taylor really standing out. The adult performances are just as great even though they're all basically small supporting roles. Tehn there's Bill Skarsgard as Pennywise. I thought the actor was terrific in the park and I enjoyed how much more sinister this clown was. I also loved the line delivery and thought the actor was terrific at bringing this character to the screen.

With that said, there are some major, major flaws that pretty much kill the horror elements of the film and that's the CGI. The CGI effects are so fake looking that I couldn't help but be taken out of the drama that was going on. This isn't a Marvel movie or some sort of fantasy. Why build up the setting so much just to throw it all away with cheap effects? And I ask you this.... Was this CGI, fake looking clown that rushes towards the camera or floats around really as creepy as the actor and his make-up? Why they had to throw these cheap, fake looking effects is anyone's guess but it really hurts the film.

Overall, I'd say that the original was better but there's still a lot of great stuff here. It's really too bad that there really aren't any scares due to the fake looking effects and it's even worse that everything was there for a much better movie. As it stands, IT is good but not a classic."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":502649,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2017-09-08","keywords":"evil clown,balloon,based on novel,supernatural power,school bullying","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1396095257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ2Y2RlZmYtNzZiNi00MjYyLWEzNjctZGRhNTE4NzNiOGM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ2Y2RlZmYtNzZiNi00MjYyLWEzNjctZGRhNTE4NzNiOGM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When children begin to disappear in the town of Derry, Maine, a group of young kids are faced with their biggest fears when they square off against an evil clown named Pennywise, whose history of murder and violence dates back for centuries."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0803889/","name":"Bill Skarsgård"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5897057/","name":"Jaeden Martell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6016511/","name":"Finn Wolfhard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615592/","name":"Andy Muschietti"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0449458/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084207/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1286060/","name":"Chase Palmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1560977/","name":"Cary Joji Fukunaga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2477891/","name":"Gary Dauberman"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
Zubati
programme.desc:
Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit: Directed by Kenneth Branagh. With Chris Pine, Keira Knightley, Kevin Costner, Kenneth Branagh. Jack Ryan, as a young covert C.I.A. analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1205537/","name":"Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MDkxNzYwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM2MjE5MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Ryan, as a young covert C.I.A. analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1205537/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"3xHCCH"},"dateCreated":"2014-01-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oddly Familiar, Yet Still Very Exciting Thriller","reviewBody":"Jack Ryan was a young Marine who was injured during a mission when his helicopter crashed. Upon completing his therapy for his injury, Ryan was conscripted by Thomas Harper to be an operative of the CIA because of his keen analytic acumen specifically in economics and finance. 

10 years later, while working in Wall Street, Ryan uncovers some suspicious transactions by a Russian firm which may spell economic disaster Stateside. Ryan goes to Moscow supposedly to do some auditing work. But upon his arrival, it was apparent that this mission was not only going to be about punching numbers into a computer.

Because of his previous work in "This is War", I knew Chris Pine could play a very good spy. Though Pine did not really look like he had a PhD degree, and a lot of his financial talk just flew over my head, his action sequences were very gritty and exhilarating. He also has great chemistry Keira Knightley, the actress who plays Ryan's charming fiancé Dr. Cathy Muller. Her suspicions of an affair unexpectedly gets her involved with Ryan's dangerous mission.

It was good to see Kevin Costner back on screen in a substantial role again. He was older of course, but still looking good. His character Harper may feel like any other mentor/supervisor role in other espionage films, but Costner played him very well. Too bad he was not really given any special moment which can be considered really memorable.

The villain of the film Viktor Cherevin though was another matter altogether. Kenneth Branagh creates a strong antagonist with his subtly sinister portrayal of the Russian businessman with terrorism, economic and otherwise, on his mind. He completely transformed into his role very convincingly, with no trace of British-ness.

This particular Jack Ryan did not feel like this was going to be the same man in the other older films where we knew the character Jack Ryan first, like "Hunt for Red October" (played by Alec Baldwin), "Patriot Games" and "Clear and Present Danger" (played by Harrison Ford) or even "Sum of All Fears" (played by Ben Affleck). This film only has the character Jack Ryan, but in a story NOT written by the books' author Tom Clancy at all.

This film had an oddly generic feel like we have seen this story in some form before. Even if this was set several years post-9/11, it had that dated Cold War (a la classic James Bond) feel especially when the action shifted to Moscow. Fortunately though, despite those gripes, "Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit" is still a very exciting action-packed thriller. 

The director is also Kenneth Branagh, whom we usually associate with Shakespearian productions. He follows up his mainstream directorial work on the first "Thor" film with this one, with much skill. The camera work was excellent especially for the gunfights and car chases. That sequence of firm infiltration was very astutely edited with much tension, impossible as that could have been in real life. 

It was Branagh's energetic story-telling and Pine's charismatic portrayal as Ryan that turned the potentially mediocre script around and created a really effective and entertaining spy thriller, successfully rebooting the character for a possible film franchise. 7/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128580,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-01-22","keywords":"jack ryan character,russian,marine,u.s. marine,terrorist plot","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3398346777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2NTM1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNzM0MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2NTM1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNzM0MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1517976/","name":"Chris Pine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000126/","name":"Kevin Costner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000110/","name":"Kenneth Branagh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3092414/","name":"Adam Cozad"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002007/","name":"Tom Clancy"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: It
To
programme.desc:
It: Directed by Andy Muschietti. With Jaeden Martell, Jeremy Ray Taylor, Sophia Lillis, Finn Wolfhard. In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1396484/","name":"It","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVkZmI0YzAtNzdjYi00ZjhhLWE1ODEtMWMzMWMzNDA0NmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYzODM3Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1396484/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Michael_Elliott"},"dateCreated":"2017-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Some Great Stuff But Also Some Flaws","reviewBody":"It (2017) 

*** (out of 4) 

A small town has a strange history with various disasters that strike every twenty-seven years and more times than not it's children that are harmed. One summer a group of friends realize that they are all being stalked by the vision of a sinister clown known as Pennywise. They soon realize that if they don't try to kill it then he will kill them one by one.

Stephen King's IT was originally made for television in 1990 and it was a hugely successful film that scared the crap out of people. The film had all sorts of hype going into it and it actually lived up to it. The film carried on a cult following for years and then news broke that a new adaptation was coming. This film really try to create the same type of hype and it ended up being a massive box office hit. People were eating it up and it's easy to see why. With that said, as much as I loved certain parts of it there's no question that there are some major flaws as well.

The great stuff includes the drama aspect of the story. The real terror comes from the bullying, the girl's sexual abuse by her father, the blame you place on yourself for your brother's death and of course there's the building of friendships that kids do during the summer. All of this is perfectly done and director Andy Muschietti does a wonderful job with the development of the characters. He also does a terrific job at capturing the mood and setting of a small town. The 1988/89 settings were perfectly captured and you can sit there and feel that you're in a real town with real characters.

All of the performances by the kids are simply wonderful with Sophia Lillis and Jeremy Ray Taylor really standing out. The adult performances are just as great even though they're all basically small supporting roles. Tehn there's Bill Skarsgard as Pennywise. I thought the actor was terrific in the park and I enjoyed how much more sinister this clown was. I also loved the line delivery and thought the actor was terrific at bringing this character to the screen.

With that said, there are some major, major flaws that pretty much kill the horror elements of the film and that's the CGI. The CGI effects are so fake looking that I couldn't help but be taken out of the drama that was going on. This isn't a Marvel movie or some sort of fantasy. Why build up the setting so much just to throw it all away with cheap effects? And I ask you this.... Was this CGI, fake looking clown that rushes towards the camera or floats around really as creepy as the actor and his make-up? Why they had to throw these cheap, fake looking effects is anyone's guess but it really hurts the film.

Overall, I'd say that the original was better but there's still a lot of great stuff here. It's really too bad that there really aren't any scares due to the fake looking effects and it's even worse that everything was there for a much better movie. As it stands, IT is good but not a classic."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":502649,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2017-09-08","keywords":"evil clown,balloon,based on novel,supernatural power,school bullying","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1396095257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ2Y2RlZmYtNzZiNi00MjYyLWEzNjctZGRhNTE4NzNiOGM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ2Y2RlZmYtNzZiNi00MjYyLWEzNjctZGRhNTE4NzNiOGM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When children begin to disappear in the town of Derry, Maine, a group of young kids are faced with their biggest fears when they square off against an evil clown named Pennywise, whose history of murder and violence dates back for centuries."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0803889/","name":"Bill Skarsgård"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5897057/","name":"Jaeden Martell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6016511/","name":"Finn Wolfhard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615592/","name":"Andy Muschietti"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0449458/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084207/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1286060/","name":"Chase Palmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1560977/","name":"Cary Joji Fukunaga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2477891/","name":"Gary Dauberman"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1396484, Title: It, --- Description: It: Directed by Andy Muschietti. With Jaeden Martell, Jeremy Ray Taylor, Sophia Lillis, Finn Wolfhard. In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1396484/","name":"It","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVkZmI0YzAtNzdjYi00ZjhhLWE1ODEtMWMzMWMzNDA0NmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYzODM3Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1396484/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Michael_Elliott","dateCreated":"2017-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Some Great Stuff But Also Some Flaws","reviewBody":"It (2017) 

*** (out of 4) 

A small town has a strange history with various disasters that strike every twenty-seven years and more times than not it's children that are harmed. One summer a group of friends realize that they are all being stalked by the vision of a sinister clown known as Pennywise. They soon realize that if they don't try to kill it then he will kill them one by one.

Stephen King's IT was originally made for television in 1990 and it was a hugely successful film that scared the crap out of people. The film had all sorts of hype going into it and it actually lived up to it. The film carried on a cult following for years and then news broke that a new adaptation was coming. This film really try to create the same type of hype and it ended up being a massive box office hit. People were eating it up and it's easy to see why. With that said, as much as I loved certain parts of it there's no question that there are some major flaws as well.

The great stuff includes the drama aspect of the story. The real terror comes from the bullying, the girl's sexual abuse by her father, the blame you place on yourself for your brother's death and of course there's the building of friendships that kids do during the summer. All of this is perfectly done and director Andy Muschietti does a wonderful job with the development of the characters. He also does a terrific job at capturing the mood and setting of a small town. The 1988/89 settings were perfectly captured and you can sit there and feel that you're in a real town with real characters.

All of the performances by the kids are simply wonderful with Sophia Lillis and Jeremy Ray Taylor really standing out. The adult performances are just as great even though they're all basically small supporting roles. Tehn there's Bill Skarsgard as Pennywise. I thought the actor was terrific in the park and I enjoyed how much more sinister this clown was. I also loved the line delivery and thought the actor was terrific at bringing this character to the screen.

With that said, there are some major, major flaws that pretty much kill the horror elements of the film and that's the CGI. The CGI effects are so fake looking that I couldn't help but be taken out of the drama that was going on. This isn't a Marvel movie or some sort of fantasy. Why build up the setting so much just to throw it all away with cheap effects? And I ask you this.... Was this CGI, fake looking clown that rushes towards the camera or floats around really as creepy as the actor and his make-up? Why they had to throw these cheap, fake looking effects is anyone's guess but it really hurts the film.

Overall, I'd say that the original was better but there's still a lot of great stuff here. It's really too bad that there really aren't any scares due to the fake looking effects and it's even worse that everything was there for a much better movie. As it stands, IT is good but not a classic.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":502649,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2017-09-08","keywords":"evil clown,balloon,based on novel,supernatural power,school bullying","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1396095257","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ2Y2RlZmYtNzZiNi00MjYyLWEzNjctZGRhNTE4NzNiOGM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ2Y2RlZmYtNzZiNi00MjYyLWEzNjctZGRhNTE4NzNiOGM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When children begin to disappear in the town of Derry, Maine, a group of young kids are faced with their biggest fears when they square off against an evil clown named Pennywise, whose history of murder and violence dates back for centuries.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0803889/","name":"Bill Skarsgård","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5897057/","name":"Jaeden Martell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6016511/","name":"Finn Wolfhard"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615592/","name":"Andy Muschietti"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0449458/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084207/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1286060/","name":"Chase Palmer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1560977/","name":"Cary Joji Fukunaga","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2477891/","name":"Gary Dauberman"],"duration":"PT2H15M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
One Missed Call: Directed by Eric Valette. With Shannyn Sossamon, Edward Burns, Ana Claudia Talancón, Ray Wise. Several people start receiving voice-mails from their future selves - messages which include the date, time, and some of the details of their deaths." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0479968/","name":"One Missed Call","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2NTk0OTcyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzk1MDU1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Several people start receiving voice-mails from their future selves - messages which include the date, time, and some of the details of their deaths.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0479968/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"demon-monkey"},"dateCreated":"2008-08-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not deserving of such a low rating - Worth a watch!","reviewBody":"I know that many people have given this a low rating but I believe that is mostly because many people had preconceptions before watching the movie because of the original Japanese version/origin and the fact that it was a remake. O.k granted it isn't the best movie of all time but far from the worst if you watch it as I did with an open mind and give it a chance under it's own merits. There were several parts in the movie where it does get you guessing and thinking that you know who is behind it but you may guess wrong - I know that I did, o.k it wasn't overly scary but a few moments where it does make you think now that would be freaky, you can see a few holes in the plot but then again you can with most movies.

All in all worth a watch with an open mind if you don't really expect anything from it and give the movie a chance!

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
Star Trek Izvan granica
programme.desc: Star Trek Beyond: Directed by Justin Lin. With Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Karl Urban, Zoe Saldana. The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2660888/","name":"Star Trek Beyond","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgzMTZmMGMtNTM4Ni00ZjIxLWIyYmUtZjcxMDEwMjkxMzQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwNDgzNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2660888/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thetruemrwalker"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best of the recent Star Trek films","reviewBody":"I must admit I am not in any way a Trekkie, but I have seen quite a few of the the Star Trek movies, and in my opinion, Star Trek Beyond, was in many ways celebrating what Star Trek is all about and having fun with it in a very entertaining and respectful way! I want more in the same spirit! All parts of the film was to my liking, the CGI and special effects, the actors and their acting, the story and script, the quirky funny jokes, the SciFi tech, the hints back to the old films and Star Trek crews, the suspension, the new characters, the villain and his brutal attacks. I want more in the same spirit! All parts of the film was to my liking, the CGI and special effects, the actors and their acting, the story and script, the quirky funny jokes, the SciFi tech, the hints back to the old films and Star Trek crews, the suspension, the new characters, the villain and his brutal attacks. Maybe for hard core fans of a certain Star Trek era, this movie is not what they wanted or expected, but to me it was brilliant!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239115,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2016-07-21","keywords":"star trek,third part,alien,stranded,sequel","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi354465561","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyODk2NzY5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI1Mjc0OTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyODk2NzY5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI1Mjc0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The USS Enterprise crew explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy who puts them and everything the Federation stands for to the test.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1517976/","name":"Chris Pine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0704270/","name":"Zachary Quinto","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881631/","name":"Karl Urban"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510912/","name":"Justin Lin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0708328/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0670408/","name":"Simon Pegg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1136647/","name":"Doug Jung","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734472/","name":"Gene Roddenberry"],"duration":"PT2H2M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Underworld
Podzemni svet
programme.desc: Underworld: Directed by Len Wiseman. With Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Michael Sheen, Shane Brolly. Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320691/","name":"Underworld","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1OTc2ZmUtODU0Yy00NGJiLWJmNmQtODI0MzBjODk3MjI4L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUzOTY1NTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320691/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lotus_chief"},"dateCreated":"2004-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Surprisingly good! I'm impressed!","reviewBody":"As soon as I saw the preview to this film I wrote it off as a silly Matrix rip-off trying to attack a subject that is so tired (vampires/werewolves). I really never had any intention of seeing Underworld until my girlfriend, who saw it in theaters, repeatedly suggested I watch it. After watching the DVD just now I must say that I enjoyed it a lot. I was completely into the story, which is surprisingly rich and engaging. One would have to be a bit naïve not to admit that Underworld does indeed borrow from a variety of action films, most notably The Matrix. It should be obvious to any free-thinking person that none of the ideas present in Underworld are original, but what this film does well is take ideas that were established in the past and build on them more. This is by no means a carbon copy of any of the films from which it borrows from. Slow motion gun battles didn't originate with the Matrix films. The most refreshing aspect of this movie is the story, which surprisingly has many layers and puts a totally fresh new spin on the vampire/werewolf stories. This aspect, along with the excellent visual effects makes Underworld an enjoyable experience. A sequel for this is inevitable, and I must say that I'm really looking forward to it. Underworld was a very pleasant surprise. \n\n*** out of **** stars","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":262931,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Fantasy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-01-07","keywords":"vampire,vampire bite,blood,death,strong female character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Underworld","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3258254105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjI2ZjE2NjYtNjRmZS00NmFkLTkzZTctZDdiYjY5ZDBjMGQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjI2ZjE2NjYtNjRmZS00NmFkLTkzZTctZDdiYjY5ZDBjMGQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Screen Gems"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005454/","name":"Scott Speedman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111274/","name":"Shane Brolly"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0936482/","name":"Len Wiseman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005323/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119799/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0340485/","name":"Kevin Grevioux"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0936482/","name":"Len Wiseman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564286/","name":"Danny McBride"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

I really never had any intention of seeing Underworld until my girlfriend, who saw it in theaters, repeatedly suggested I watch it. After watching the DVD just now I must say that I enjoyed it a lot. This is by no means a carbon copy of any of the films from which it borrows from. Slow motion gun battles didn't originate with the Matrix films. The most refreshing aspect of this movie is the story, which surprisingly has many layers and puts a totally fresh new spin on the vampire/werewolf stories. This aspect, along with the excellent visual effects makes Underworld an enjoyable experience. A sequel for this is inevitable, and I must say that I'm really looking forward to it. All parts of the film was to my liking, the CGI and special effects, the actors and their acting, the story and script, the quirky funny jokes, the SciFi tech, the hints back to the old films and Star Trek crews, the suspension, the new characters, the villain and his brutal attacks. Maybe for hard core fans of a certain Star Trek era, this movie is not what they wanted or expected, but to me it was brilliant!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239115,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2016-07-21","keywords":"star trek,third part,alien,stranded,sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi354465561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyODk2NzY5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI1Mjc0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyODk2NzY5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI1Mjc0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The USS Enterprise crew explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy who puts them and everything the Federation stands for to the test."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1517976/","name":"Chris Pine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0704270/","name":"Zachary Quinto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881631/","name":"Karl Urban"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510912/","name":"Justin Lin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0708328/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0670408/","name":"Simon Pegg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1136647/","name":"Doug Jung"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734472/","name":"Gene Roddenberry"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="
